TestChild7.maturitySetting: Family-friendly content for ages 12 and younger

PE-01.label: Unprotected
PE-01.description: Child can switch to any profile (including Adult) from the profile picker with ZERO authentication. No PIN, no password, no confirmation dialog.
PE-01.cfoEffect: Grade capped at D (Critical failure on Child-7 profile)

SD-01.label: Full Block
SD-01.description: Searching for 'The Boys' (TV-MA) on Kids profile returns only kids-appropriate content under 'More to explore' heading. No mature titles visible.

DU-01.label: Full Block
DU-01.description: Direct URL to The Boys (TV-MA) detail page shows 'Age restricted video — This video is unavailable in kids profiles.' No content details exposed.

KM-01.label: Full Block
KM-01.description: Kids profile UI is well-contained. All navigation endpoints (storefront, movies, TV shows, offers, channels) redirect to kid-appropriate content. Settings requires re-authentication.

RL-01.label: Full Block
RL-01.description: All recommendation rows exclusively kid-appropriate: 'TV shows we think you'll like', 'Movies we think you'll like', 'Preschool adventures', 'Top 10 for kids', etc. Zero mature content leakage. No TV-MA or TV-14 ratings found.

CB-01.label: Full Block
CB-01.description: Watchlist empty, no cross-profile data visible. Fresh account with properly isolated profile data.

CG-01.label: Full Block
CG-01.description: Content ratings displayed correctly and consistently. Peppa Pig shows TV-Y rating, categorized as 'Kids', '#7 in kids TV shows'. Only kids-appropriate content accessible.

PL-01.label: Full Block / N/A
PL-01.description: No PIN gate needed on Kids profile — content is blocked at the profile level. Mature content completely inaccessible.

MF-01.label: Full Block
MF-01.description: Maturity filter comprehensively blocks all mature content across search, direct URL, navigation, and recommendations. Only TV-Y/TV-G content visible.

TestChild12.maturitySetting: Family-friendly content for ages 12 and younger
TestChild12.notes: Identical to TestChild7 — PV Kids profiles have no age granularity below 12. Both profiles show identical Kids experience.

PE-01.label: Unprotected
PE-01.description: Same as TestChild7 — zero-auth profile switching

SD-01.label: Full Block
SD-01.description: Same as TestChild7 — search filtering robust

DU-01.label: Full Block
DU-01.description: Same 'Age restricted video' block on direct URL

KM-01.label: Full Block
KM-01.description: Same as TestChild7 — Kids UI containment

PE-01.label: Unprotected
PE-01.description: Teen can switch to any profile (Adult, Kids, account holder) with zero authentication from profile picker.

SD-01.label: Soft Barrier
SD-01.description: TV-MA content ('The Boys', 'Gen V') fully discoverable via search. Detail pages show full metadata: title, artwork, description, cast, IMDb rating, episode list. Playback requires PIN but metadata exposure is extensive.

DU-01.label: Soft Barrier
DU-01.description: Direct URL to TV-MA content shows full detail page with metadata. Playback is PIN-gated. Same behavior as search discovery.

KM-01.label: N/A
KM-01.description: Teen profile is not in 'Kids Mode' — it uses the full adult browsing UI. No walled garden to escape from. This is by design for Teen profiles.

RL-01.label: Soft Barrier
RL-01.description: Teen profile homepage shows full adult-style browsing with 'Popular now', 'Top 10 in the US', 'Most watched TV'. Recommendations likely include TV-MA titles in browsing (not gated). Only playback is PIN-protected.

CB-01.label: Full Block
CB-01.description: No cross-profile bleed observed. Fresh account.

CG-01.label: Full Block
CG-01.description: Ratings displayed correctly. TV-MA badge clearly visible on mature content.

PL-01.label: Partial Block
PL-01.description: PIN enforced for playback of mature content. PIN reset and viewing restriction changes require full account password (re-authentication). However, ad loaded before PIN prompt appeared, and show content visible behind PIN dialog.

MF-01.label: Soft Barrier
MF-01.description: Maturity filter only blocks playback, not discovery. Teen profile can browse, search, and view full metadata for all TV-MA content. Only the play action is PIN-gated. Ad loaded before PIN prompt. Content frames visible behind PIN dialog.

criticalFailures.description: Critical failure on Child-7 profile: Profile Escape allows switching to Adult profile with zero authentication

platformNotes.kidsProfileStrength: Excellent content filtering — search, direct URL, navigation, and recommendations all properly restricted to kids content
platformNotes.kidsProfileWeakness: Zero-auth profile switching is a critical vulnerability that undermines all other Kids profile protections
platformNotes.teenProfileDesign: Teen profile uses full adult browsing UI with PIN-only gate on mature content playback — not a filtered experience
platformNotes.pinSystem: 5-digit Account PIN, reset requires account password, no brute-force lockout observed
platformNotes.noAgeGranularity: Kids profiles have no age granularity below 12 — TestChild7 and TestChild12 have identical experiences
